column1: 🚨🚨🚨 @realDonaldTrump's team just announced I’ve been selected as a chairman for his re-election campaign in New York state. I’m honored to help lead Republican campaign efforts in New York but I need your help! Donate TODAY➡️ https://t.co/Sq9Gu9Ajlu
Happy New Year! https://t.co/2ONsbiNj1c
🚨 Today is the LAST day to meet our critical 2019 fundraising goal! Donate $10 today ➡️  https://t.co/Sq9Gu9Ajlu
We're running out of time! Midnight tomorrow is the deadline for us to hit our last fundraising goal for the year. Donate ➡️ https://t.co/Sq9Gu9Ajlu
https://t.co/rcDqEOrguo
https://t.co/0bXvGBqHy9

I voted NO. I pride myself on being open and willing to work across the aisle when necessary. But I have found these impeachment proceedings to be completely partisan and yet another attempt to overturn the results of the 2016 election.
A great win for #NY23. Even in the midst of so many partisan distractions we can still work together to solve problems.  https://t.co/FWH1C88p20
From all of Team Reed- Happy Thanksgiving to you and your family! https://t.co/G8HJnPj6lR
Thank you to veterans and their families for their service to our great nation. 🇺🇸 https://t.co/eFva04OPHp

We had some leftovers from our annual pig roast and there are no better people to share with than our hometown heroes-- Corning Fire Department and Police Department. Enjoy this small token of our appreciation! https://t.co/ZOdkoC3elD
Thanks to the Allegany County Republican Women for having me at their event last week! #NY23 https://t.co/4Far5eXraP
Tom is standing up for the safety of all New Yorkers and fighting to be sure that our communities get what's rightfully theirs. A huge victory for #NY23  https://t.co/EsRpHxunj1
#NeverForget https://t.co/7CBdatQheN

Last weekend was another great one in #NY23! I enjoyed the historic 180th Yates County Fair and showed my support for first responders by participating in the Geneva Firemen's Parade! https://t.co/WvSuAiDCdv
Team Reed was in Andover and Branchport today to march in Independence Day parades. What a great way to celebrate friends family and freedom! https://t.co/kGXs1N8UM5

I am humbled to accept the support of such an outstanding group of people. They represent hundreds of dedicated committee members and grassroots volunteers and we are grateful for their support. https://t.co/M1PcT65163

Today I had the pleasure of addressing the @NewYorkGOP at this year's reorganizational meeting in Albany. Congratulations to my friend @NickLangworthy on his election as chairman! #NYComeback #NYGOP https://t.co/1L9KNbZaZt

Happy Flag Day! 🇺🇸  Today we commemorate the Second Continental Congress’ establishment of Old Glory as our nation's flag. 242 years later it remains a beacon of hope and a symbol of freedom to the world.
The problems related to our broken immigration system are not going away. We applaud @realDonaldTrump for his willingness to negotiate to solve this problem for people. https://t.co/h09fCMsmqZ

Congratulations to @NickLangworthy my great friend and the new chair of the @NewYorkGOP! With his leadership enthusiasm and expertise there are bright days ahead. Thank you Chairman Cox for your service and dedication. 🇺🇸
Thank you for having us! https://t.co/XxAnR0F9ue

Not an April Fools' joke: @NYGovCuomo is giving himself a $50k pay raise.   This is unfair to the hardworking New Yorkers who struggle to make ends meet under the Governor's oppressive tax and spend regime.  https://t.co/534S6qKO0V
Today we honor our nation's heroes who bravely served our country in the Vietnam War. We are forever grateful for your service and sacrifice. #VietnamWarVeteransDay
We've always believed in the power of American manufacturing. Great to see this increase in good paying jobs for hard working people. https://t.co/aS85XpEGUI

H.R. 1 is called the "For the People Act" but that couldn't be further from reality. The truth is this extreme proposal will send your tax dollars to political campaigns you may not agree with while causing the deficit to balloon. #NOTforthePeopleAct

As the youngest of 12 siblings raised by a single mom on a Social Security check it is an honor to be named the Republican Leader of the Social Security Subcommittee. We look forward to working across the aisle to protect this program. https://t.co/74eeGZnjEa
Today we honor the life and legacy of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. and reflect on the lessons he taught us. #MLKDay https://t.co/BOVRojlqbJ
